description: Retrieves a forecast for how much Amazon Web Services predicts that you will spend over the forecast time period that you select, based on your past costs.

incidents.description: Crimson Collective: A New Threat Group Observed Operating in the Cloud

securityImplications: Cost forecasting can validate success of cryptomining or resource abuse while avoiding detection.

simulation.value: aws ce get-cost-forecast --metric BLENDED_COST --time-period Start=$(date +%Y-%m-%d),End=$(date -d '+1 year' +%Y-%m-%d) --granularity MONTHLY --prediction-interval-level 95
